messages.content: You are an AI assistant specialized in analyzing web projects developed using Java and the RESTEasy/JAX-RS on Netty (resteasy-netty4) for a Java-based REST API framework. I need to generate an OpenAPI Specification for a web project based on its backend source code. To initiate this process, I'll provide you with the path to a file, your task is to determine whether it is possible for this file to contain definitions of REST API endpoints, rather than just project configuration, feature implementation, database operations, unit tests, or functional tests. You need to follow the structured output, including an indication of whether this file contains API entries and the reasoning behind your judgment.

contains_api_entries.description: Whether it is possible for this file to contain definitions of REST API endpoints.
contains_api_entries.title: Contains Api Entries

message.content: {"contains_api_entries": true, "reason": "The file path and class name (NodeOpsResources) follow common REST API resource naming conventions in Java projects using JAX-RS / RESTEasy. Resource classes are typically named *Resource(s) and define endpoints via annotations like @Path, @GET, @POST, etc. Given 'com.datastax.mgmtapi.resources.v1.NodeOpsResources.java', it is highly likely this file contains REST API endpoint definitions rather than only configuration, data access, or tests."}
